name: Brathian
description:
Brathian is an action platformer with some touches of exploration and a cute retro inspired look.

Discover this land that used to be magical, but had all its magic sealed into a crystal due to many wars fought for its power.
Play as Edgar or Amy in an adventure to defeat and use the power of the guardians to stop whoever is trying to snatch the crystal.Features
  • Single and two player co-op modes
  • Power-ups to open secrets, increase your health, damage and mobility
  • Cute characters and enemies
  • Gameplay that can be finished in one go
  • Controller support
